name: celebratehub
description: Milestone Celebration System for GitHub repositories

scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev-demo: npx concurrently "npm run server-demo" "npm run client"
scripts.dev-main: npx concurrently "npm run server-main" "npm run client"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.setup-old: echo 'Running setup...' && npm run install-all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start the app.'
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Dependencies installed! Run npm run dev to start the app.'
scripts.start-app: npx concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"

author: CelebrateHub Team
